name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「別世界」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Another world＂【#天音かなた3周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [szUbg1Yar5c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Zankyou Sanka' on a stage set that looks like a European town at night.
A teaser movie for Amane Kanata's original song 'Another World', featuring voice acting and dramatic scenes.
Amane Kanata performs her original song 'Another World' on a darkened stage under a single spotlight.

subtitles.original: ただ一人舞う夜
subtitles.english: Just dancing alone through the night

subtitles.original: 違えないタイを結べば
subtitles.english: If we tie a bond that never fails

subtitles.original: 手のひらの中強欲に
subtitles.english: Greedily in the palm of my hand

subtitles.original: 深紅の過去さあ暴れ
subtitles.english: Now, let the crimson past run wild

subtitles.original: この先どんな辛い時も
subtitles.english: No matter how painful the times ahead may be

subtitles.original: 口先よりも胸を張って
subtitles.english: Hold your head high instead of just making excuses

subtitles.original: 抱いた夢の灯を全部辿るだけ
subtitles.english: Just trace all the lights of the dreams you held

subtitles.original: 逃げ出すためここまで来たんじゃないだろう？
subtitles.english: You didn't come all this way just to run away, did you?

subtitles.original: 選ばなければ選ばれればいい
subtitles.english: If you don't choose, you should just be chosen

subtitles.original: 声を枯らして燃える花のように
subtitles.english: Like a burning flower with a withered voice

subtitles.original: 闇間を照らしたら
subtitles.english: If I light up the darkness

subtitles.original: 曖昧すぎる世界も鮮明にして
subtitles.english: I'll make even this world that's far too vague clear

subtitles.original: 夜を数えて朝を描くような
subtitles.english: Counting the nights and painting the morning

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな音色を鳴らす
subtitles.english: I'll make a vibrant melody ring out

subtitles.original: どんなに深い後悔も
subtitles.english: No matter how deep the regret

subtitles.original: どんなに高い限界も
subtitles.english: No matter how high the limit

subtitles.original: 掻き消して 残響
subtitles.english: Drown it out, echo

subtitles.original: ねぇ、見て
subtitles.english: Hey, look

subtitles.original: ほら、早く
subtitles.english: Come on, hurry up

subtitles.original:
(C-020)
「もうやめてよ！」
subtitles.english:
(C-020)
'Stop it already!'

subtitles.original: もうやめてよ！
subtitles.english: Stop it already!

subtitles.original:
(C-022)
「ん、おいしい！食べてみて！」
subtitles.english:
(C-022)
'Hmm, delicious! Try it!'

subtitles.original: ん、おいしい！食べてみて！
subtitles.english: Hmm, delicious! Try it!

subtitles.original: ねえ。
subtitles.english: Hey.

subtitles.original: もう、終わりにしない？
subtitles.english: Shouldn't we end this already?

subtitles.original:
(C-052)
「あなたのことが、」
subtitles.english:
(C-052)
'I’ve always...'

subtitles.original: あなたのことが、ずっと...
subtitles.english: I’ve always...

subtitles.original:
(C-071)
「ずっと、好きでした」
subtitles.english:
(C-071)
'...liked you.'

subtitles.original: 好きでした。
subtitles.english: ...liked you.

subtitles.original:
別世界
作詞・作曲:天音かなた 編曲:Numa
subtitles.english:
Another World
Lyrics/Composition: Amane Kanata, Arrangement: Numa

subtitles.original: 作文の空白を埋めるみたいに
subtitles.english: Like filling in the blanks of an essay

subtitles.original: 一日をただ過ごした
subtitles.english: I just spent my day

subtitles.original: 僕はまた狭い部屋で膝抱き寄せて
subtitles.english: In my cramped room again, I hug my knees

subtitles.original: 笑えるほど何度も何度も
subtitles.english: Time and time again, it’s almost laughable

subtitles.original: あなたを想った
subtitles.english: I thought of you

subtitles.original: 笑顔も声も愛も口癖だって
subtitles.english: Your smile, your voice, your love, even your favorite phrases

subtitles.original: 見てるだけでいい そう思っていたのに
subtitles.english: Just watching you is enough, or so I thought

subtitles.original: 愛してくれ 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Please love me

subtitles.original: どうか邪魔などしないから
subtitles.english: I promise I won't get in your way

subtitles.original: 消せない写真と目合わせて
subtitles.english: Locking eyes with the photos I can't delete

subtitles.original: 笑ってくれ 僕のことを
subtitles.english: Please laugh at me

subtitles.original: あなたには届かないけど
subtitles.english: Even though my voice won't reach you

subtitles.original: 酷く焦がれる恋をしてた
subtitles.english: I was in a love that burned so deeply

subtitles.original: 混ざることない指 息を止める
subtitles.english: Fingers that will never intertwine, I hold my breath

subtitles.original: 名も無い僕は客席の中
subtitles.english: Me, with no name, among the audience

subtitles.original: 舞台の二人ただ見つめて
subtitles.english: Just staring at the two of you on stage

subtitles.original: 今知らないあなたがまた増える
subtitles.english: Now, there’s more of you that I don’t know

subtitles.original: 僕もまた肥大した心が醜く溢れた
subtitles.english: And my own heart has become bloated and overflowed hideously

subtitles.original: 目配せの意味 揃いの仕草だって
subtitles.english: The meaning of a glance, even our matching gestures

subtitles.original: 額縁の中さ 無様に手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Within the picture frame, I pathetically reach out my hand

subtitles.original: 気付いてくれ 僕の声に
subtitles.english: Please notice my voice

subtitles.original: 「片想いみたいだ」だなんて
subtitles.english: Saying something like, 'It's like an unrequited love'

subtitles.original: そんな綺麗なものじゃないや
subtitles.english: It's not something as beautiful as that
